ygData.subject: In Permafrost
ygData.msgSnippet: SO Im in permafrost now.. just got there late last night.. cool place.. (no pun intended) anyhow.. I hear there are some good loot there. I am in it for Exp
ygData.messageBody:
SO Im in permafrost now.. just got there late last night.. cool place.. (no
pun intended) anyhow.. I hear there are some good loot there. I am in it for
Exp mainly but some items or a good item to give to my future wife would be
great. I am 20 and with my pet i didn't die once.. so we are good to go. I
will of course group as soon as possible.. dangers when you are alone...
So.. my question is..

What can i expect Lootwise and from who ? I am a magicuser, so anything good
for me, I want to target.. I know group of course.. but i just want to know
what im getting into.

Can anyone give me any advice in case i can't find a group ? i did okay.. it
was like 2 ice gobs then med.. 2 ice gobs med.. seemed to be my flow.. fine
by me.. because my exp bar was going up..
